CHAT.comment: J. MCINTYRE MACHINERY, LTD., Petitioner v. ROBERT NICASTRO, ET UX.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:13 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ARTHUR F. FERGENSON ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ALEXANDER W. ROSS, JR., ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT BY ARTHUR F. FERGENSON ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:13 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
